com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.locale

Interface DynamicLocale

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicActivity, DynamicApplication, DynamicDrawerActivity, DynamicPermissionsActivity, DynamicSplashActivity, DynamicStateActivity, DynamicSystemActivity, DynamicTutorialActivity, DynamicWidgetActivity

    public interface DynamicLocale
    An interface to implement the dynamic locale changes throughout the app.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Locale getDefaultLocale(Context context) 
      Locale getLocale() 
      String[] getSupportedLocales() 
      Context setLocale(Context context)
      Apply the locale according to the configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedLocales

        @Nullable
String[] getSupportedLocales()
        Returns:
        The array of supported locales.
        See Also:
        ConfigurationCompat.getLocales(Configuration)

      • getDefaultLocale

        @NonNull
Locale getDefaultLocale(@NonNull
                                 Context context)
        Parameters:
        context - The context to get configuration.
        Returns:
        The default locale to be used if no dynamic locale support is provided.
        See Also:
        getLocale()

      • getLocale

        @Nullable
Locale getLocale()
        Returns:
        The locale to be applied.
        See Also:
        Locale

      • setLocale

        @NonNull
Context setLocale(@NonNull
                           Context context)
        Apply the locale according to the configuration.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to set the locale.
        Returns:
        The modified context after applying the locale.
